title: How to Catch Pichu in Pokémon Sun and Moon

steps.title: Go to Route 1.
steps.content: Go to Route 1. Pichu can only be found in the patch of grass near the exit to Iki Town, so go there. You have a 5% chance of finding one, so it may take a while to do so.

steps.title: Run in that patch of grass until you find a Pichu.
steps.content: Run in that patch of grass until you find a Pichu.

steps.title: Damage the Pichu a bit.
steps.content: Damage the Pichu a bit. Be careful not to faint it, or you'll have to search for another one.

steps.title: Use a Poké Ball.
steps.content: Use a Poké Ball. Any ball will do, but your best bet is to use a Nest Ball, since it'll be at a low level.

steps.title: Make sure it is registered to your Pokédex and save.
steps.content: Make sure it is registered to your Pokédex and save.
